name: Project Absence
description:
It's the year 20XX and high technology reigns. But, known only to a few, progress is being threatened by a hidden enemy risen from the ashes of the old world...

It's monday, 2 am and three figures make their way into the 40th floor of the Echo building.

Join Vinh in a tale about friendship and adventure with classic jrpg mechanics and a fun customization system.

The game is still in alpha stage.

Controls:

- Arrow keys: Movement 

- Z/Enter: Action/Accept 

- X/Esc: Open Menu/Cancel

-Hold Shift to run (toggleable in options menu)
